name: Airone Pisa Park Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I booked this hotel online before we left the US. We got to the airport and got a rental car and drove right to the hotel, it took us only about 15 min to get to the hotel and the front desk staff was very nice and showed us the restaurant so we could have dinner and our room.. We stayed at this hotel for two nights to rest and tehn we took of from there to see Tuscany, a dream of ours.. The hotel was perfect, only a 1hr drive to Florence and 20min drive to Lucca.. The hotel was very clean with exelent service and had free internet at the front desk and in the room, wich was great for us. The hotel was very traquile and a very nice place to rest between our trips to the other cities.. We stayed a total of 8 nights at this hotel in this trip and it was a great choice, you never know exactly what you will get when you book a hotel online.. Nice surprise.
reviews.title: great base for your tuscany trip

reviews.text: Oh! The hotel is very nice! We could swimm and walk around. Beautiful view also! The city is small but you can see the tower. Famous tower! The hotel is well located and we could travel to Genova and Firenze very fast from there. Good location!
reviews.title: good location

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night in July at the end of a brilliant 2 week Tuscan holiday. I didn't have high expectations and was thus not disappointed.
reviews.title: Ok for a night or two

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is some way away from the Centra of Pisa so you definitely need a car or a cab to get there.
reviews.title: This was an absolute nightmare - Do Not Stay There!!!!

likes.disliked: — I didn't like anything about this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were given 2 rooms in the new block. The rooms were absolutely fine. Air conditioned, big beds, clean and with very modern bathrooms with lovely showers.
reviews.title: great find

reviews.text: Hotel is fine if you need a stopover for several nights if your moving on elsewhere in the region. Our room faced out onto a garden with a picnic table which would have been lovely if it was not so overgrown. Gardeners did arrive during our second visit several weeks later. Room was clean and reasonably spacious for the four of us. It was noisy at night but if we closed the doors this did rectify the situation, even though it was rather airless.
reviews.title: Reasonable for the price

reviews.text: The location is great for getting into Pisa and the beautiful and historical Lucca to the north by car. Breakfast was reasonable at 5 euros, although we weren't too keen on the plastic cutlery and crockery.
reviews.title: very nice reasonable hotel

reviews.text: The pool was clean but would have benefitted from more sun loungers and some parasols. We didn't manage to eat in the on-site restaurant, although we heard from fellow guests that the standard wasn't that great.
reviews.title: Great place to end your holday

reviews.text: The receptionist was very obliging but seemed responsible for everything in the hotel. Whilst I was there he had to deal with several mix-ups over bookings which I think had been made centrally over the internet.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

likes.disliked: — a bit out of the way

reviews.text: very nice place.
reviews.title: Beautiful place, friendly staff

likes.liked: — The beautiful surroundings and rooms and the friendly staff

reviews.text: We spent four nights here at the end of September. The hotel lacks charm but is acceptable and, most importantly, clean. The rooms are large by European standards. The reception and bar are poor. The gardens are pleasant but, when we were there ,the pool needed a clean. The breakfast was poor. The rolls were hard and the croissants did not appear to change in the four days we were there ! It was OK as a place to stay as we had a car and it is quite close to the autostrada. We easily visited Florence, Sienna, Lucca, and the beach. There are plenty of restaurants within a few miles. The restaurant that is supposed to be attached to the hotel was closed the whole time we were there and I think that it was probably for the best as it looked scruffy and small. We were told that ' the chef has had to go away suddenly and we don't know when he will be back ' - Oh yeah ! There is free internet access but it was limited for us to 2 hours. We felt sorry for people staying there without a car. All in all I would not recommend it
reviews.title: Forget it if you have not got a car

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Chose the hotel on the basis of TripAdviser reviews, needing a couple of nights stay close to Pisa Airport before returning home following a couple of weeks touring in Italy. First impression neutral, room OK, staff not very welcoming but did the job. However after unpacking and relaxing in the garden in the early evening we were attacked by mosquitos and bitten on all exposed limbs. The hotel is located in low-lying fields and surrounded by canals - perfect breeding grounds for the little bxxxx! The rooms are fitted with mosquito blinds so - don't open them, or you will be in for a difficult night! Food is available at the taverna next door to the hotel otherwise it is a drive or bus ride back into Pisa. We ate in the taverna on night one - fish was off and the rest of the menu was very uninspiring so do take the taxi option. On night two we found a very good Pizzeria in the next village so don't despair. Breakfast very uninspiring but at €5 what can you say. We won't be going back!
reviews.title: beware the little biters

likes.disliked: — Bedroom over reception area - noisy, mosquitos!

reviews.title: had a wonderful time
reviews.text: An exelent place for a short break or a longer stay. I chose this hotel as it seemed like an ideal place to explore both Pisa and the surrounding area of Tuscany, without the hustle and bustle of being in the city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I went there for a short break to spend some time with my eleven year old son before he started school. My son had a marvalous time, the added bonus of the outside swimming pool made for a great place to socialise and meet like minded people.
reviews.title: Great location

likes.disliked: — Sharing our balacony with next door.

reviews.text: ALL of the hotel staff where brilliant and very helpful and could speak very good english.
reviews.title: Nice Place, Shame about the staff!

reviews.text: I stayed at the Airone Pisa Park hotel for my hen weekend. We shared a triple room which was spacious and clean. The bathroom appeared to be newly refurbished and was huge! Beds were comfortable, but only one pillow each and staff could not locate any extra. Breakfast was simple, but sufficient for a day sightseeing or relaxing by the pool. The pool was excellent and the garden quiet.
reviews.title: Highly recommend Airone Pisa Park

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is suituated approximately 10-15 mins from Pisa centre, but we all felt we preferred staying out of town. The hotel is quiet and not on a main road. A taxi costs between 8 - 12 Euros. There is a bus stop a short walk from the hotel which stops at the main areas in Pisa.
reviews.title: Charming and Peaceful

likes.liked: — Good location to Leaning tower of Pisa and peaceful countryside

reviews.text: Staff were friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: nice hotel

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Airone Pisa Park Hotel for one night and absolutely loved it. Giovanni the owner was very nice. The accomodations were comfortable & very peaceful in the countryside. There is very easy access to the Leaning Tower of Pisa by bus or car which only takes appx 5 minutes. We really appreciated being able to see the sites and come back to our quite country villa & swim in the pool on a hot day. We were dissppointed we only stayed one night but we already had accomadations booked at our next destination. We would definately stay here again.
reviews.title: more than i expected from a 3 star

reviews.text: The hotel was very nice.. The price was great and the service excelent.. The owner lended us free bycicles so we could go everywhere in Pisa.. The breakfast was the best I had in Italy, fresh bread and croissants, chesse, ham, salami all fresh brought to our table.. Also the free internet and free english cable tv were a plus.. I will definetally stay in this place when I cameback to Italy.
reviews.title: Okay for one night

aka: Airone Pisa Park Hotel Province Of Pisa/San Giuliano Terme, Italy
